name: Arcadia Crisis
description:
My take on rail-shooter of the arcade era (Time Crisis in mind of course :-))
But it's a rail-slasher !

Left click to attack (Hold for charged attack x3 damage)

Right click to dodge

You recover stamina while dodging

What's missing :

  • Some enemies should have been shielded, you would have to charge attack them once before doing damage to them.
  • More waypoints per room
  • Connected rooms in the same level, to respect the level design of classic rail-shooter
  • Collect coins from enemies and random chest spawning
  • Possibility to improve your stats between levels with the collected coins
  • Two weapons : one for melee, one for range, you have to swap to reach the corresponding enemies.
  • Range weapon is charge only weapon but do not cost stamina
  • Range enemies throwing projectile that could be destroyed
  • Better handling of enemies attack sequence inside a same room
  • Many VFX & SFX

3rd parties :

  • I use DoTween from Demigiant : http://dotween.demigiant.com/
  • Fonts and UI elements are from Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets)
  • 3D Models come from AurynSky, TS WORK, Kunniki and Kevin Iglesias free packages on the Unity Asset Store (I add details later when I'll have slept)
  • Music is from here : https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/the-show/
